toast.failedToCreate: Failed to create gig. Please try again.

BecomeSeller.message: Once you create, you can easily switch between them without losing data.
BecomeSeller.alreadyHas: You already have a seller account linked to your profile.

createGig.title: Create a Gig
createGig.subtitle: Sign up for free, set up your Gig, and offer your work to our global audience.

deliverWork.title: Deliver great work
deliverWork.subtitle: Get notified when you get an order and use our system to discuss details with customers.

getPaid.title: Get paid
getPaid.subtitle: Get paid on time, every time. Payment is available for withdrawal as soon as it clears.

whatCanISell.question: What can I sell?
whatCanISell.answer: Be creative! You can offer any service you wish as long as it's legal and complies with our terms. There are over 200 categories you can browse to get ideas.

howMuchMoney.question: How much money can I make?
howMuchMoney.answer: Your earnings depend on the demand, quality, and uniqueness of your service.

howMuchTime.question: How much time will I need to invest?
howMuchTime.answer: You decide your own schedule — from part-time to full-time commitment.

howDoIGetPaid.question: How do I get paid?
howDoIGetPaid.answer: Payments are securely processed and transferred directly to your chosen method.

howMuchDoesItCost.question: How much does it cost?
howMuchDoesItCost.answer: Creating an account is free. We only take a service fee per completed order.

howDoIPrice.question: How do I price my service?
howDoIPrice.answer: You set your own price depending on complexity, time, and expertise.
